carpet.rule.noBatSpawning.name: No bat spawning
carpet.rule.botPrefix.name: The prefix of the bot
Creative player enchantments follows the rules of vanilla
carpet.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.name: Empty shulker boxes can be stacked
carpet.rule.useDyeOnShulkerBox.name: Shulker box blocks can be dyed
carpet.rule.xaeroWorldName.name: Xaero world name
carpet.rule.playerSit.name: Player can sit
carpet.rule.canUseHatCommand.name: Enable hat command
carpet.rule.canUseSitCommand.name: Enable sit command
carpet.rule.maxUpdateQueueSize.name: Maximum allowed capacity of update queue
carpet.rule.oldRedstoneConnectionLogic.n: Restore the previous redstone wire connection logic
carpet.rule.enableCCESuppressor.name: Enable CCE suppressor.
carpet.rule.fakePlayersNotOccupiedSleepQ: Fake players do not occupy sleep quotas.
carpet.rule.printStackTraceOnVillagerSpa: Print the stack trace when a villager spawns
carpet.rule.obtainableReinforcedDeepSlat: When an anvil falls on 64 dropped deepslates, they will be turned in a reinforced deepslate instead of disappearing.
For jobless/nitwit villagers, after performing a set number of tick operations, skip the 1 tick operation.
carpet.rule.creativeNoInfinitePickup.des: If my inventory is full, don't pick up items in creative mode.
carpet.rule.botPrefix.desc: Set the prefix for the bot players, value #none for no prefix.
Making creative player to enchant with anvils and enchanted books also need to follow the vanilla rules
carpet.rule.useDyeOnShulkerBox.desc: Dyes can be used on shulker boxes, empty potion will clean color
carpet.rule.xaeroWorldName.desc: set xaero world name to sync word id to xaerominimap, "#none" is disable.
carpet.rule.playerSit.desc: Player can sit down when fast sneak 3 times.
carpet.rule.canUseHatCommand.desc: Allows all players to use the /hat command to place their main hand items in the helmet slot
carpet.rule.canUseSitCommand.desc: Allows all players to use the /sit command to sit down
carpet.rule.maxUpdateQueueSize.desc: Set the maximum allowed length of the update queue
carpet.rule.oldRedstoneConnectionLogic.d: Restore the interaction logic between the Redstone wire and the trap door to the performance of versions 1.19 and earlier
carpet.rule.enableCCESuppressor.desc: Make CCE suppressors from 1.20.1 and earlier versions available again.
carpet.rule.fakePlayersNotOccupiedSleepQ: Make the fake player generated by Carpet no longer occupy sleep quotas
carpet.rule.endermanCanPickUpMushroom.de: Enderman can pick up the mushroom plant if enabled
carpet.rule.printStackTraceOnVillagerSpa: Print the report to the server console when a villager spawns
Set to 0 to maintain the vanilla behavior
Set to a number greater than 0, the value will be +1 based on the setting
To prevents villagers from getting completely stuck when set to 1
carpet.rule.maxUpdateQueueSize.extra.0: If set to a value not greater than 0, turn off this function and run according to Vanilla
carpet.rule.maxUpdateQueueSize.extra.1: Otherwise, when the number of single updates exceeds the set value, an OutOfMemoryError will be thrown to generate update suppression
carpet.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.extra.0: Empty shulker boxes can stack in a player's inventory or hand
carpet.rule.emptyShulkerBoxStack.extra.1: Empty shulker boxes will not stack in other inventories, such as chests or hoppers
carpet.rule.elytraCraftable.desc: Make elytra craftable for Minecraft 1.20.6+ (eltra wont disappear when crafting)
